title: The Frenzy Of Evolution - Novel Updates
tags: Absent Parents   Adapted to Manhua   Animal Rearing   Apocalypse   Cheats   Cowardly Protagonist   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Evolution   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Mutated Creatures   Naive Protagonist   Pets   Reincarnation   Second Chance   Secret Organizations   Special Abilities   System Administrator   Weak to Strong   Younger Sisters   Zombies
author: Bunny Eats Grass On The Edge Of The Nest   兔子专吃窝边草
description: After an unprecedented virus storm hit the world, the world became a wasteland. When desire loses its shackles, the only rule is the strong eating of the weak. When life loses weight, only evolution is the only way back. On December 21, 2012, the surviving humans opened their eyes and found that the world was in ruins, like hell. However, the moment Duan Fei opened his eyes, he found himself in heaven!>
